name: The Agent of Miracles - Jupiter
text: Once per turn: You can banish 1 "The Agent" monster from your GY, then target 1 LIGHT Fairy monster you control; that target gains 800 ATK until the end of this turn. Once per turn: You can discard 1 Fairy monster, then target 1 of your banished LIGHT Fairy monsters; Special Summon it. "The Sanctuary in the Sky" must be on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.
